titles.title: A bill to suspend for a 9-month period the duty on certain mixtures of cross-linked sodium polyacrylate polymers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/3/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through October 31, 1987, the duty on mixtures of two or more organic compounds containing one or more cross-linked sodium polyacrylate polymers.
